items.content_html: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.
items.title: robertluiz/TabStateSync: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.

items.content_html: üõ°Ô∏è Sendexa 2FA Server A lightweight, open-source 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) server built with TypeScript and Node.js. It supports OTP (One-Time Password) generation and verification via SMS and Email, designed for businesses across Africa. This server includes in-memory OTP storage, flexible sender ID configuration, and versioned API endpoint
items.title: sendexa/Sendexa-2fa-Server: üõ°Ô∏è Sendexa 2FA Server A lightweight, open-source 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) server built with TypeScript and Node.js. This server includes in-memory OTP storage, flexible sender ID configuration, and versioned API endpoint

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
items.title: iamVihanga/Ride-Service-Backend: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
